metadata.title: CVE-2023-52694 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/bridge: tpd12s015: Drop buggy __exit annotation for remove functionWith tpd12s015_remove() marked with __exit this function is discardedwhen the driver is compiled as a built-in. The result is that when thedriver unbinds there is no cleanup done which results in resourceleakage or worse.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
